summary: No explicit Requirements/Acceptance Criteria were provided in the BuildRequest, so there are no spec-defined requirements to mark as missing. The diff does introduce several user-facing/frontend features not requested by the BuildRequest (e.g., background music controller, new post-presale section, and various promotional/visual additions).

hallucinated_features.description: Background music controller / background music UX and persistence
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest (which focuses on presale deposit detection/status updates and includes non-goals around payment rails/real-time updates, but nothing about audio).

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a new 'PostPresaleListingsSection' in the main app layout
Footer attribution/UTM tracking changes (caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking)
